experiences.description: Recently promoted to Senior Software Developer, leading backend initiatives to improve scalability, system performance, and feature expansion across critical order processing systems.
achievements: Promoted to Senior Software Developer in July 2025
Architected modular AWS Step Functions workflow to replace monolithic Lambdas, reducing order creation time by 50%
Enhanced order pipeline reliability with a retry system using PostgreSQL and AWS SQS, cutting manual intervention by 90%
Designed and deployed secure IVR-support API with Snowflake analytics integration for improved call center operations
Developed tax recalculation Lambda improving post-shipment tax accuracy by 20%
Mentored junior developers and supported technical decision-making in team architecture reviews

experiences.description: Worked on critical backend systems for order workflows, multi-line product support, and legacy system decoupling, contributing to performance, maintainability, and customer experience.
achievements: Implemented Matrix Multi-Line Ordering system allowing agents to combine multiple products in a single order
Maintained backward compatibility with legacy systems while introducing new APIs for order modification
Built microservice to manage calendar-based order holds using event-driven triggers, reducing Oracle system dependency
Improved order event processing via a retry mechanism to minimize manual troubleshooting

experiences.description: Joined Cimpress as a backend engineering intern, contributing to backend testing, performance reliability, and system optimization.
achievements: Increased backend test coverage from 54.3% to over 80% by integrating SonarQube into CI pipelines
Resolved recurring payment failures by fixing alert triggers and improving DynamoDB consistency
Refactored legacy code for improved maintainability by removing outdated PRM logic
